title: Decision tree + Smart data augmentation
description: In this approach we use Bag of decision trees. Features: Surrouding cells for a given cell. Data Augmentation  Background color is detected using custom logic. Custom logic is written to find the colors which need to be excempted from augmentation. All the colors which are present in all the input of training exmaples are marked for excemption. Color which is not present in input but present in output are excepted.   For rest of colors all permutations are used to augment.  Model Bag of decision trees are used since, single decision tree have some randomness factor which may give incorrect result. Result Training: Solved 41/400
description_lemmatized: approach use bag decision tree feature surrouding cell given cell data augmentation background color detected using custom logic custom logic written find color need excempted augmentation color present input training exmaples marked excemption color present input present output excepted rest color permutation used augment model bag decision tree used since single decision tree randomness factor may give incorrect result result training solved 41400
